text: Francisco Balagtas (1788–1862) was a Filipino national poet. Balagtas may also refer to: *Balagtas, Bulacan *Balagtas (crater) *Irving Reef (or Balagtas Reef), a coral reef in the Spratly Islands *Balagtasan, an art form ==People with the surname== *Jose Balagtas *Maricar Balagtas
title: Balagtas (disambiguation)
